entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 1:24 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
